participants.name: DeLeon Mitts
participants.title: HashiCorp: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Automation (Cloud & External Services)

messages.message:
American Express has the perfect Sr. Cloud SW Engineer (IaaS / PaaS) role for you in North Phoenix
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/#/jobs/15016249/Phoenix-Arizona-Senior-Cloud-Software-Engineer-OpenStack-OpenShift-Cloud-Foundry?lang=en-US
deleon.mitts@aexp.com
deleon.mitts@aexp.com

Thanks for reaching out! I'd love to hear more.
Thank you for your interest, I have been developing software since I was only 11 years old. I started in VB4 and explored .Net since it's inception. Later I honed my skills on the web with PHP and JavaScript. I enjoy all forms of software development and computer administration. In previous positions a 6 month salary review has worked well, as it gives us both a chance to show what we are made of, without breaking the bank. I have a lot of experience with start-ups, so I am no stranger to bringing new products and technologies to market in a controlled environment. I would enjoy a change to meet more of the team. For reference, I would be looking in the ballpark of $180k. Thank you. -Brian
Too high for a credit card company?  Doubtful.

AMEX may have the perfect role for you within our Cloud Engineering (OpenStack / OpenShift) team in Palo Alto or Phoenix
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/jobs/15007112/Palo-Alto-California-Senior-Software-Engineer-OpenStack-OpenShift?lang=en-US
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/jobs/15009978/Palo-Alto-California-Senior-QA-Test-Engineer-OpenStack-or-OpenShift-test-experience-required?lang=en-US
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/jobs/15010812/Palo-Alto-California-Director-of-Software-Engineering-Cloud-Platform-Engineering?lang=en-US
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/jobs/16003945/Palo-Alto-California-Senior-Product-Manager-Enterprise-Cloud-Platform?lang=en-US
https://jobs.americanexpress.com/jobs/16004256/Phoenix-Arizona-DevOps-Engineer?lang=en-US
deleon.mitts@aexp.com

Thanks for reaching out! I'd love to hear more. Thank you for your interest, I have been developing software since I was only 11 years old. I started in VB4 and explored .Net since it's inception. Later I honed my skills on the web with PHP and JavaScript. I enjoy all forms of software development and computer administration. In previous positions a 6 month salary review has worked well, as it gives us both a chance to show what we are made of, without breaking the bank. I have a lot of experience with start-ups, so I am no stranger to bringing new products and technologies to market in a controlled environment. I would enjoy a change to meet more of the team. For reference, I would be looking in the ballpark of $180k. Thank you. -Brian
